'''Longo Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Longo was the third child and second son of [[Mungo Baggins]] and [[Laura Grubb]]. He married [[Camellia Sackville]], the daughter of the [[Sackville Family]] patriarch.<ref>{{L|214}}</ref> In {{SR|1310}}, their son [[Otho Sackville-Baggins]] was born.<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>
